custom-sql.sql: ( SELECT app.* from ScienceApp_ScienceApp AS app where (app.title LIKE ?) OR (app.name LIKE ?) ) UNION ( SELECT app.* FROM ( SELECT man.* FROM ( SELECT user.* FROM User_ AS user WHERE user.screenName = ? ) AS user JOIN ScienceApp_ScienceAppManager AS man ON user.userId = man.managerId ) AS sm JOIN ScienceApp_ScienceApp AS app ON sm.scienceAppId = app.scienceAppId ) UNION ( SELECT app.* FROM ( SELECT aff.* FROM SciencePlatformhook_SpAffiliation AS aff WHERE aff.spAffiliationName LIKE ? ) AS affid JOIN SciencePlatformHook_SpUser AS spUser ON spUser.spAffiliationId = affid.spAffiliationId JOIN ScienceApp_ScienceApp AS app ON (app.userId = spUser.spUserId OR app.authorId = spUser.spUserId) )

SELECT app.* FROM ( SELECT man.* FROM ( SELECT user.* FROM User_ AS user WHERE user.screenName = ? ) AS user JOIN ScienceApp_ScienceAppManager AS man ON user.userId = man.managerId ) AS sm JOIN ScienceApp_ScienceApp AS app ON sm.scienceAppId = app.scienceAppId

SELECT app.* FROM ( SELECT aff.* FROM SciencePlatformhook_SpAffiliation AS aff WHERE aff.spAffiliationName LIKE ? ) AS affid JOIN SciencePlatformHook_SpUser AS spUser ON spUser.spAffiliationId = affid.spAffiliationId JOIN ScienceApp_ScienceApp AS app ON (app.userId = spUser.spUserId OR app.authorId = spUser.spUserId)

SELECT A.* FROM (SELECT E.*, F.data_ universityld FROM EDAPP_ScienceAppCategoryLink D INNER JOIN( SELECT C.categoryId FROM AssetEntries_AssetCategories C INNER JOIN AssetCategory B ON C.categoryId = B.categoryId WHERE B.vocabularyId = #vocabularyId# <isNotEmpty property="entryId"> AND C.entryId = #entryId# </isNotEmpty> AND B.parentCategoryId != 0 ) AS BC ON D.categoryId = BC.categoryId INNER JOIN EDAPP_ScienceApp E ON D.scienceAppId = E.scienceAppId AND E.status = 1901004 INNER JOIN (SELECT F.data_, F.classPK FROM ExpandoValue F WHERE F.columnId = #columnId#) AS F ON E.userId = F.classPK GROUP BY D.scienceAppId ) AS A INNER JOIN (SELECT B.* FROM EDAPP_ScienceAppFavorite B WHERE B.userId = #userId#) B ON A.scienceAppId = B.scienceAppId
SELECT A.* FROM EDAPP_ScienceApp A, User_ U, ExpandoValue E
SELECT A.* FROM EDAPP_ScienceApp A, EDAPP_ScienceAppManager B, User_ U, ExpandoValue E

WHERE A.swTest = 0 <isNotEmpty property="companyId"> AND A.companyId = #companyId# </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="userId"> AND A.authorId = #userId# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="myManagerAppSearch"> AND A.scienceAppId = B.scienceAppId </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="myManagerAppUserId"> AND B.userId = #myManagerAppUserId# </isNotEmpty>
AND A.authorId = U.userId
<isNotEmpty property="notEditorTypeString"> AND UPPER(A.editorType) != 'STRING' </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="appType"> AND A.appType = #appType# </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="status"> AND A.status = #status# </isNotEmpty> AND U.userId = E.classPK <isNotEmpty property="columnId"> AND E.columnId = #columnId# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="targetLanguage"> AND A.targetLanguage LIKE '%@@targetLanguage@@%' </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="APP_MANAGER_SEARCH_ALL"> AND ( A.name LIKE '%@@searchValue@@%' OR EXTRACTVALUE(A.title, 'root/Title[@language-id="@@targetLanguage@@"]') LIKE '%@@searchValue@@%' OR U.firstName LIKE '%@@searchValue@@%' OR E.data_ IN (#searchOrgCode#) ) </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="SWNM"> AND A.name LIKE '%@@searchValue@@%' </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="SWTITLE"> AND EXTRACTVALUE(A.title, 'root/Title[@language-id="@@targetLanguage@@"]') LIKE '%@@searchValue@@%' </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="SWUSERNM"> AND U.firstName LIKE '%@@searchValue@@%' </isNotEmpty>
ORDER BY A.createDate DESC
SELECT A.*, B.* FROM EDAPP_ScienceAppCategoryLink A , EDAPP_ScienceApp B, User_ U, ExpandoValue E
SELECT COUNT(distinct B.scienceAppId) AS totalCnt FROM EDAPP_ScienceAppCategoryLink A , EDAPP_ScienceApp B, User_ U, ExpandoValue E
SELECT A.*, B.* FROM EDAPP_ScienceAppCategoryLink A, EDAPP_ScienceApp B, EDAPP_ScienceAppManager C, User_ U, ExpandoValue E
SELECT COUNT(distinct B.scienceAppId) AS totalCnt FROM EDAPP_ScienceAppCategoryLink A, EDAPP_ScienceApp B, EDAPP_ScienceAppManager C, User_ U, ExpandoValue E

WHERE <isNotEmpty property="companyId"> A.companyId = #companyId# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="appType"> AND B.appType = #appType# </isNotEmpty> AND A.scienceAppId = B.scienceAppId <isNotEmpty property="myManagerAppSearch"> AND B.scienceAppId = C.scienceAppId </isNotEmpty> AND B.authorId = U.userId AND U.userId = E.classPK <isNotEmpty property="myManagerAppUserId"> AND C.userId = #myManagerAppUserId# </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="userId"> AND B.authorId = #userId# </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="columnId"> AND E.columnId = #columnId# </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="parentCategoryId"> AND A.parentCategoryId IN (#parentCategoryId#) </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="categoryId"> AND A.categoryId = #categoryId# </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="targetLanguage"> AND B.targetLanguage LIKE '%@@targetLanguage@@%' </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="status"> AND B.status = #status# </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="APP_MANAGER_SEARCH_ALL"> AND ( B.name LIKE '%@@searchValue@@%' OR EXTRACTVALUE(B.title, 'root/Title[@language-id="@@targetLanguage@@"]') LIKE '%@@searchValue@@%' OR U.firstName LIKE '%@@searchValue@@%' OR E.data_ IN (#searchOrgCode#) ) </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="NOFILTERSEARCH_SCIENCEAPPSTORE"> AND ( EXTRACTVALUE(B.title, 'root/Title[@language-id="@@targetLanguage@@"]') LIKE '%@@searchValue@@%' OR B.name LIKE '%@@searchValue@@%' OR E.data_ IN (#searchOrgCode#) OR EXTRACTVALUE(B.developers, 'root/Developers[@language-id="@@languageId@@"]') LIKE '%@@searchValue@@%' ) </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="SWNM"> AND B.name LIKE '%@@searchValue@@%' </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="SWTITLE"> AND EXTRACTVALUE(B.title, 'root/Title[@language-id="@@targetLanguage@@"]') LIKE '%@@searchValue@@%' </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="SWUSERNM"> AND U.firstName LIKE '%@@searchValue@@%' </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="SWORGNM"> AND E.data_ IN (#searchOrgCode#) </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="SWDEV"> AND EXTRACTVALUE(B.developers, 'root/Developers[@language-id="@@languageId@@"]') LIKE '%@@searchValue@@%' </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="listsearch"> GROUP BY B.scienceAppId </isNotEmpty>
ORDER BY B.createDate DESC
<isNotEmpty property="begin"> LIMIT #begin#, #end# </isNotEmpty>

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(A.simulationCreateDt, "%Y-%m-%d %T") AS simulationCreateDt, COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_CNT, SUM(IF(B.jobStatus=1701005,1,0)) AS QUEUED_CNT, SUM(IF(B.jobStatus=1701006,1,0)) AS RUN_CNT, SUM(IF(B.jobStatus=1701011,1,0)) AS SUCCESS_CNT, SUM(IF(B.jobStatus=1701012,1,0)) AS FAILED_CNT, B.jobUuid FROM EDSIM_Simulation A, EDSIM_SimulationJob B WHERE A.simulationUuid = B.simulationUuid <isNotEmpty property="scienceAppId"> AND A.scienceAppId = #scienceAppId# </isNotEmpty> AND A.testYn = 'Y' AND B.jobPhase = '1301003' GROUP BY A.simulationUuid ORDER BY A.simulationCreateDt DESC <isNotEmpty property="begin"> LIMIT #begin#, #end# </isNotEmpty>
SELECT COUNT(*) AS totalCnt FROM EDSIM_Simulation A WHERE <isNotEmpty property="scienceAppId"> A.scienceAppId = #scienceAppId# </isNotEmpty> AND A.testYn = 'Y';

SELECT AC.categoryId, COUNT(APP.scienceAppId) AS appCnt FROM AssetCategory AC LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT ESA.scienceAppId, ESA.targetLanguage, ESACL.categoryId FROM EDAPP_ScienceApp ESA, EDAPP_ScienceAppCategoryLink ESACL WHERE ESA.scienceAppId = ESACL.scienceAppId AND ESA.targetLanguage LIKE '%@@targetLanguage@@%' ) APP ON AC.categoryId = APP.categoryId WHERE AC.parentCategoryId = #parentCategoryId# GROUP BY AC.categoryId HAVING COUNT(APP.scienceAppId) > 0
